physical_appearance: The image shows an artist's proof. It is rectangular in shape. The background of the artist's proof is purple in colour. It depicts a worker standing at the top of a wooden ramp. The worker is wearing a pink shirt and adorns a brown hat. Two pails are suspended from a shoulder yoke that is being carried by the worker.The background of the images depict the cloudless blue sky as well.
sgcool_label_text:
This photograph by Singaporean photographer Tan Lip Seng was submitted to the Royal Photographic Society (UK) for his Fellowship application. This work is one of the examples of Tan's innovative colour technique, in which he creates a high contrast backdrop in order to bring out details of his subject matter. 

Tan Lip Seng started his career as a medical photographer at the National University of Singapore. He was the first Singaporean to be awarded a fellowship by the Royal Photographic Society of the United Kingdom in 1970.
creator_1: Tan, Lip Seng, 1942- Tan, Lip Seng
title_text: Tough Job: Artists' Proof Tough Job
